Lines.Description: Print 'Runtime Error: Bad teleporter' on quit
If 'camera_x' LessThan 'Player_X / XRes * XRes' ELSE GOTO 00001198
If 'camera_x' GreaterThan 'Player_X / XRes * XRes' ELSE GOTO 00001280
If 'camera_y' LessThan 'Player_y / yres * yres' ELSE GOTO 00001362
If 'camera_y' GreaterThan 'Player_y / yres * yres' ELSE GOTO 00001444
Print 'AGA is required for this Scorpion Engine Game' on quit
Print 'Cannot set yres while level loaded' on quit
Print 'Whoops! Out of battery' to bottom panel
Print 'Don't cross the joy beams!' to bottom panel
Yield on actor timer to  next line
Yield on actor timer to  next line
Yield on levelyield timer to  next line
Print 'Telegram from Santa:' to bottom panel
Yield on levelyield timer to  next line
Yield on levelyield timer to  next line
Print 'Christmas can commence!' to bottom panel
Yield on levelyield timer to  next line
Print 'Telegram from Santa:' to bottom panel
Yield on levelyield timer to  next line
Print 'You didn't catch all the spirits!' to bottom panel
Yield on levelyield timer to  next line
Print 'We need to cancel Christmas!' to bottom panel
Yield on levelyield timer to  next line
Print 'Spirit capture bonus! ${temp}' to bottom panel
Yield on levelyield timer to  next line
Print 'Not enough money to pay bills!' to bottom panel
Yield on levelyield timer to  next line
Print 'Elf medical bills: -${temp}' to bottom panel
Yield on levelyield timer to  next line
Print 'Not enough money to pay bills!' to bottom panel
Yield on levelyield timer to  next line
Yield on levelyield timer to  next line
Yield on levelyield timer to  next line
Yield on levelyield timer to  next line
Yield on levelyield timer to  next line
Print 'December {day}. {enemies_left} Spirits left.' to bottom panel
Yield on levelyield timer to  next line
Yield on levelyield timer to  next line
Yield on levelyield timer to  next line
Yield on levelyield timer to  next line
Print 'All halloween spirits captured!' to bottom panel
Print 'Too many elves injured..' to bottom panel
Print 'All chests are full...' to bottom panel
Print 'Need to get a recharge...' to bottom panel
Yield on levelyield timer to  next line
Print 'Game over. Press fire to restart.' to bottom panel
Print 'Telegram from the Bank:' to bottom panel
Yield on levelyield timer to  next line
Print 'The loan is now due.' to bottom panel
Yield on levelyield timer to  next line
Print 'Repaid in full. Thank you!' to bottom panel
Yield on levelyield timer to  next line
Print 'You have ${cash} left over.' to bottom panel
Yield on levelyield timer to  next line
Print 'You're unable to pay!' to bottom panel
Yield on levelyield timer to  next line
Print 'We have to foreclose on your HQ.' to bottom panel
Yield on levelyield timer to  next line
Print 'You got em!' to bottom panel
Yield on levelyield timer to  next line
Print 'Returning to north pole.' to bottom panel
Print 'You need at least two elves!' to middle panel
Print 'You need at least one chest!' to middle panel
Print 'You need at least one battery!' to middle panel
